      Admitted Student Reception in China                      Friday, April 17, 2015 - Monday, April 27, 2015                             Location: China              Contact: Office of Graduate Enrollment Management and Admissions engineering.gradinfo@nyu.edu 718-260-3182                              Join Us   Congratulations on your admission to a graduate program at the NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering! Representatives from the School of Engineering invite you to attend one of our Admitted Student Receptions in the locations below.   Admitted graduate students are invited to discuss information on the world-class education, vibrant student life, and unparalleled career outcomes NYU Engineering graduate students can expect. A multimedia presentation and light snacks will also be provided.   Please submit an RSVP for the tour location of your choice using the form below.
